tool_description: Extracts clean text content from web pages, filtering out navigation, ads, and boilerplate content while preserving main article text.

url.description: URL of the web page to scrape

user_agent.description: Custom user agent string for the request

extract_links.description: Whether to extract hyperlinks from the content

error_messages: Invalid URL format: Provide a valid HTTP or HTTPS URL.
Network connection failed: Unable to connect to the specified URL.
HTTP error response: Received error status code from server (404, 403, 500, etc.).
Request timeout: Server did not respond within the specified timeout period.
Content extraction failed: Unable to parse HTML content or extract meaningful text.
Blocked by robots.txt: The URL is blocked by the site's robots.txt file.
usage: Provide a valid URL to extract content. Adjust timeout for slow sites, set custom user_agent if needed, and enable extract_links to capture hyperlinks.

extracted_text.description: Clean main content extracted from the web page

links.description: List of hyperlinks found in the content

word_count.description: Number of words in extracted content
